storyInfo: Amiya's squad, which had retreated to the underground base, prepares to leave the Sudean Borough with the Self-Salvation Corps. Suddenly, the Sarkaz start to exterminate the Corps soldiers left on the surface.

attributes.content: We're down thirteen civilians and nine soldiers.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: They're proving to be quite troublesome.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: General, we've finished the head count on the remaining Dublinn soldiers.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Give them one chance.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Those willing to join us will enter the mercenary squad.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: As for those who aren't... You already know what to do with them.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Not your best showing, General Manfred.
...I didn't expect for Confessarius's Messenger to still be here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Both the Leader and the Regent are concerned about the battle situation unfolding in this inconspicuous corner.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: I trust the Sanguinarch is no exception.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: After all, his generosity last night took a lot of the pressure off of us.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Oh right, he wanted me to let you know, the atmosphere here is too filthy. He doesn't plan to wait around much longer.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: At the moment, he is in the unfortunate process of requisitioning the property of a factory owner, and will be enjoying a late dinner.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Requisitioning?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I do hope that... whoever the Prince 'requisitioned' the factory from isn't one of our partners.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Does that matter?
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: These inefficient factories provide us with hardly anything worthwhile. All they do is breed pests.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: His patience will only last until tomorrow night.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: If you are unable to provide him with a satisfactory banquet, then he will 'sweep' these filthy streets as he sees appropriate.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Is this the Sanguinarch's intent, or the decision of the Military Commission?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Always fussing over these irrelevant details. This is exactly why you've been pinned down in this little dump. His Highness expected more of you.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: ...Please report back to the Prince: We are deeply grateful for his assistance, and will proceed with the next phase of the operation.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Very well. We look forward to seeing your results.
attributes.name: Confessarius Guard

attributes.content: Heading off to war isn't nearly as much of a slog as talking to these Royal Court people, eh?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: So this is where you've been hiding.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I assure you, I haven't been slacking off.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You can stop cradling that arm you nearly lost. Tell me, which of your old acquaintances did that to you? The one with the explosives, or the one with the sword?
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sorry, it hurts so bad I can't remember anything.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Since they left you with another arm to pick up a sword with, it seems whoever it was still has a soft spot for you.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: It's almost daybreak.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: ...Yeah, looks like it.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Stop leaning against the wall in a daze. Break time's over.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Mercenaries aren't eligible for sick leave, right?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Let's go. This battle is far from over.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: How many injured are there? Take them to get treated right now!
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: I'll also help out!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Mhm, thank you.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Bring Harmo over here. We have to speed up the evacuation.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Also, dispatch some Messengers outside the city. Worst case scenario, we need to be prepared to relocate the bulk of the population.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Yes, Commander!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Miss Siege...
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Miss Siege?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Oh... Sorry, your voice always makes my mind wander off.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You must be exhausted. Just like our soldiers.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Thanks for your concern. I'm hanging in there.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The piece of intel you brought back— that the warriors of Team 6 were slaughtered by extremely terrifying Originium Arts, is critically important to us.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: If only I could've gone to the surface to check on them sooner...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No, you would've been in danger too.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Besides, you've already done enough. If not for your quick-thinking, it might not have been just Team 6 that ran into him, but the rest of our troops and your people as well.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Who is he? Those Sarkaz soldiers seemed to call him a prince.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...Three months ago, a nobles' banquet was held in northern Londinium.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: It began with great fanfare. The lights stayed on the entire night, and it wasn't until the servants went to clean the venue on the second day that they discovered that the only thing left was a still-playing record player.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Everyone was dead?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: All killed in a single instant, it seems. Some of them still kept their posture from the moment of death, glasses raised in a toast.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Among the slain were those with connections with us. Heidi knew them too.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I lost several old friends that night. The Self-Salvation Corps also lost a significant portion of its network throughout the city.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: It's not for no reason that we retreated to the edge of the wall.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: But it's thanks to Heidi's unfaltering efforts that we've managed to survive. And soon enough, we'll have a chance to face the Sarkaz head-on.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Before that though... we still need to escape the gaze of that terrifying individual.
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: Amiya, would you happen to know who he is?
attributes.name: Clovisia

attributes.content: If my hunch is correct, the person looming above us is probably... a vampire.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...This'll be tough.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: How tough?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: To be honest, it's probably easier for me to make a new one from scratch than try to glue the pieces together.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Don't have the parts.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Huh? No way...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: We're in Londinium. Most of the city's industrial resources are controlled by the Sarkaz, and we don't exactly have the luxury of scrounging up scraps for something that won't be used on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Your work environment is way too...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Impoverished? You can speak your mind, the commander isn't here.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: ...Way too much of a challenge. *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Miss Closure...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: D-Did you know, when you talk about being challenged, your eyes seem to... light up? Physically.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Huh? Really? Must be because I'm getting excited... Is it scary?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I-It's fine.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: To be honest, it wasn't until I met you that I found out... Uhh, that Sarkaz can do more than just fight.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Oh... Uh, there are a lot of people who aren't fighters, like me.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Naturally, I'm a vampire, so of course I was born with some handy talents.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Huh? Y-You... what is this speed?! It'd take a week for me to do what you did in a single night!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Why do you think the pillars of Rhodes Island are so good?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Take a good look at my eyes. If the Rhodes Island landship was filled with vampires, working at night would be no problem, and we'd cut down big on the electricity bill.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Are there... a lot of vampire engineers?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Of course not! They... They all...
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, why'd you start shuddering all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Blame Londinium. It's been a long time since I last felt the fear of being this close to a den of evil. Look, my hands are totally frozen stiff! And I need these hands!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Could it be... that Team 6 ran into...?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I sure hope not.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: If so... For real, I need to give you guys a serious warning.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Just in case... I mean, just in case—if you ever run into another vampire, run!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: No, it might already be too late by then.
attributes.name: Closure
Closure
attributes.content: I hope you'll never...

attributes.name: Closure
attributes.content: Never ever bump into them.
attributes.joined: I hope you'll never...Never ever bump into them.

attributes.content: Morgan, you and Indra will go help the Self-Salvation Corps relocate.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Mm, I'll be there right away.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What is it, Doctor?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Were you looking for me?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: I want to talk about Dagda.;How are you doing?

attributes.content: Dagda... made her decision.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I... When I had to take up the mantle as their leader, I've never stopped thinking about how to do the right thing.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And at Rhodes Island, I saw how you went about doing that.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm fine... But, I'm really worried about Dagda.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's no different from how you're worried about us, though. We both have our own responsibilities to shoulder.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Dagda is... pretty much in the same situation as me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Every moment she stayed with me, her actions were bound by responsibility. No matter how many times I told her to make her own decisions, she would never be able to choose any other outcome.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: When we truly have the capacity to make a choice, what truly matters is having the authority to make that so-called choice. Otherwise, it is nothing more than coercion, wrapped in a more palatable package.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't want to have to push her along ever again. She needs to accept herself, and then walk down her own path with conviction.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: You can continue like this and become a regular soldier.;You can also go to them and tell them who you really are.
No matter what you decide, Rhodes Island and I will support you.

attributes.content: Becoming a run-of-the-mill soldier might be the easy way out.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But my family name... No matter what you all decide to call me, I can't deny my name. It's a part of me.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I hope I didn't scare you by telling you the truth, Doctor.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit said she was willing to tell you, but I decided to do it myself.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You don't seem all that surprised.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: Maybe because I don't remember the past.;Maybe because I only care about the present.;Maybe because I'm looking ahead to the future.

attributes.content: ...You don't remember the past?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Even though you've suffered so much due to that... I can't help but wonder, is your life a little bit easier because you can't remember?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: That's right, what's most important is always the present.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: When I made the decision to leave Victoria, all I wanted was for me and Indra to live to see this moment.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The future...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Which way... will my future take me?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Only I can answer that question. Nobody else can.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Phew... When I'm around you, I can always relax so easily.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It might be because... even when you found out the truth, the only person reflected in your eyes was the operator known as 'Siege'.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Instead of... Victoria.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Coming back to Londinium has brought back many memories.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But at the same time, so much has changed.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The decisions I make no longer solely affect my team.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Doctor... I don't actually want 'choice' to be an excuse that holds me back.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: I'm here today as a result of my choices.;My choices determine how I move forward.
Someone once said I'd find my own path.
Vina, I want to share those words with you too.
You always have the right to choose.

attributes.content: ...Miss Heidi.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya? I'm currently tending to the wounded.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You... practice medicine?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Only some basic nursing techniques.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: This job inevitably brings me into emergency situations. To give me and my friends a better shot at survival, I had to at least learn to use a first-aid kit.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: You're really amazing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All we're doing is protecting our home. But Kal'tsit... and you, Amiya, you all carry so much more responsibility on your shoulders.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: ...We've lost a lot of people on this operation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I... I feel the pain of the Self-Salvation Corps' soldiers. They've never had to deal with such horrific enemies before.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Sanguinarch... Did he come here because of us?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, what you need to hear isn't me saying 'no, it's not your fault.'
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Clovisia said she was afraid Rhodes Island would get the Self-Salvation Corps involved in a war they weren't a part of.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If working with us puts them at greater risk...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: During last night's operation, what would've happened if Rhodes Island had not been there?
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Without W colluding, had she not stopped the mercenary leader... and without Rhodes Island's operators keeping Manfred at bay, we wouldn't even be having this conversation right now.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: The calculus of exchanging one set of lives for another simply does not exist for Rhodes Island—
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: But even if Kal'tsit were here, I'm sure she would say every opportunity comes with its risks.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's why we have to be better prepared.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Miss Heidi, I need more information from within the city. Not counting the Sanguinarch, how many kings do the Sarkaz have inside Londinium?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Excuse me, I'd like a bag of bread.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I don't need your money, lass. Take all of these with you.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hurry along, and don't come out here again.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I know who you are. Actually, we can all tell.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Even if you took off your equipment and changed your clothes, both your actions and the look in your eyes won't fool anyone.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I might as well pack up too. Don't think there's business to be had today.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: We're doing another sweep of this street! Take away anyone whose name is on the list!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on? I... I'm just a restauranteur. Didn't you come by to have fried finmeat before...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: You're the one we're after.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Your cover runs pretty deep. Selling fried meat to us by day, peddling information to the rebels by night?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Take them away! And check those buildings next door. They're all rebels!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Why are the Sarkaz suddenly going around grabbing people?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: H-Hurry, take a turn at the alley just ahead and find the others—
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Ugh—!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Another one down.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You lot, search that alley over there. Don't let a single one of them escape this borough.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Report, we ran into Sarkaz as soon as we came out...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: No, they weren't guarding the city exits, they suddenly appeared in the middle of the streets!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Commander, do you think our comms have been compromised?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Please be careful... The soldiers dispatched out of the city have all perished. I can't hide for much longer either!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Bloody hell, why can't I shake them off?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: The Sarkaz seem to have suddenly figured out all our passages and networks!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: In just... a single night...?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: What exactly happened last night?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Haha, wouldn't you like to know.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Huh? What the hell are you? My blade snapped clean in half—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The way you're dressed... Are you a Rhodes Island operator? Thank you. You guys saved us again.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Soldier

attributes.content: Hurry back.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: Wait, be sure to tell Amiya and the Doctor that the underground isn't safe anymore.
attributes.name: Misery

attributes.content: The traps we ran into yesterday... aren't the only ones we've discovered.
attributes.name: Misery
